messages.message:
@mfichman, others

I noticed we set instabase_uri to be
```https://https{{env "$SANDBOX_ENDPOINT_DNS_SUFFIX"}}```
in the https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/third-party/crafting/templates/ibdev-backend.yml#L110

This causes our helpers to generate strange links like
```https://https//https--demetr-sand2-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/review?runId=576de8c5-af0c-4832-accc-a45256bf87d9```
(obviously not working)

Was this done accidentally or for any specific purpose? Can I just fix it (remove all https parts to be the same as other places)?
